revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 45:;Pharmouthi 5.;Helene, daughter of Hieranouphis (Touamabis);;(in left margin: drachmas 8 obols 28) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obls 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharge obl 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, drachmas 11 obols 1.5 chalki 2;;Valerius Cassianus (Tappseis);;and taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 11 obols 3.5, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obols 4, naubion drachma 1 obol 1, surcharges drachmas 3;;(in left margin: drachmas 56 obols 14) eparourion drachmas 7 obols 4.5 surcharge obols 4,;kollybos obls 2.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 26 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 29, surcharge drachma 1 obol 5, in total drachmas 30 obols 5; ;Petheus, son of Petesouchos (Ebathanmintiles);;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira obols 5, tax on the produce of olives obol 1, naubion obl 0.5, surcharges obol 1.5;;Herakles, son of Petheus, grandson of Onnophris, mother Taseus; drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Limnaios, grandson of Onnophris, mother Isidora, drachmas 12;;Taarpagathes, daughter of Orsenouphis (Thantaksis);;(in left margin: drachmas 24 obols 21) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 5 obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4.5 chalki 2, naubion obols 3.5, surcharges drachma 1 obols 2 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 3 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 12 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 13 obol 1 chalki 2, surcharges obols 5, in total drachmas 14 chalki 2;;Helene, daughter of Pnepheros (Tremenesis);;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 9) land tax for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 2 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges, surcharges obol 1, kollybos 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 4 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6 obol 1.5, surcharges obols 2.5, in total drachmas 6 obols 4.;Dioskoros, son of Aiaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Thases, drachmas 8;;Sabeinos, son of Petheus, grandson of Sambas, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Sambas, son of Pasoknopaios (Tkoukis);;(in left margin: drachmas 16 obols 4) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 3 obols 1.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 3, naubion obols 2, surcharges obols 5;;eparourion drachmas 2 obols 1.5, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 7 obols 3; ;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 7 obols 5, surcharges obols 3, in total drachmas 8 obols 2;;Protas, son of Papontos;;(in left margin: drachmas 4 obols 14) tax for the 13th year on services of donkeys in the 11th year drachmas 5, surcharges obols 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 2;;Thaisas, daughter of Onnophris (Naaraus, son of Nasses);;(drachmas 8 obols 28) land taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;Zenas, son of Phaesis, grandson of Zenas, mother Tapasion, drachmas 4."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
